reviewText: General info. Early 90s production. Not the best production elements or dramatizations. Although for those fans of the witchcraft theme it could be a possible addition to a dvd collection.

A great video which dose not portray Witches as evil or Satan worshipers. A good overall account of the Witchcraft history including Wicca. The churches influence an cause to the Witch hysteria in both the US and Britain.  There is some personal opinions in the video it is one of the best I have seen.
